moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nc3 Nc6 3. Nf3 d6 4. h3: I do not like these bishops attacking the horses.
moves.10... Re8: This is the one move that allowed me to move in the horse later on.
moves.11. Bh6: Never happy with an approaching queen.
moves.11... Bh8: Retreat was clearly not the better option for pointing at f8.
moves.12... Bb7 13. f4: Time to free the f file.
moves.18... Kf8: Wrong direction but protecting the bishop is a reflex.
moves.19. Qg5 Qd7: This is not an escape route.
moves.20. Qxf6+: Qf7 Qexf7 checkmate. Pinned down. Such a brutal victory.
